downloadTitle: Managing Microsoft Teams Android devices - Module 3
downloadDescription: Learn how to manage Microsoft Teams Android devices in your organization.

downloadFile.name: Module 3 - Managing Microsoft Teams Android Devices.pptx

detailsSection: Learn how to leverage the Teams Admin Center to manage Microsoft Teams devices, how to use Conditional Access to securely sign into Teams Android devices, and how to use Microsoft Endpoint Manager with Teams Android devices.
detailsSection_file_name: Module 3 - Managing Microsoft Teams Android Devices.pptx
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file or find the file on your device and open it.
